A '''mud brick slab''' is a [[mud brick]] variant of a [[slab]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Mud brick slabs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Mud Brick Slab
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Natural generation ===
Mud brick slabs generate as part of [[trail ruins]].

{{Crafting

== Usage ==
{{for|information about the placement mechanics of all slabs|Slab#Usage}}

=== Note blocks ===
Mud brick slabs can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
